summary.span: 定義提供無限制執行緒主物件的介面，這個物件允許背景執行緒直接呼叫 (避免封送處理至 UI 執行緒)。

span.span: Defines an interface that proffers a free-threaded host object that allows for background threads to call directly (avoids marshalling to the UI thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果專案上設定屬性變更`/platform`值`AnyCPU`或預設平台值 (`null`或"") 以`AnyCPU32BitPreferred`。If the property is set on the project, changes the `/platform` value `AnyCPU` or the default platform value (`null` or "") to `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[/platform (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/platform.md)。`AnyCPU` `/platform`切換設定 (`/platform:AnyCPU`) 執行您的應用程式做為 64 位元處理序，您應該盡可能將回到至 32 位元為僅 32 位元系統。For more information, see [/platform (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/platform.md).The `AnyCPU` `/platform` switch setting (`/platform:AnyCPU`) runs your application as a 64-bit process whenever possible, falling back to 32-bit for 32-bit-only systems. 不過，執行為 32 位元應用程式通常是慣用執行它們做為 64 位元，因為 64 位元應用程式可能會耗用更多記憶體。However, running applications as 32-bit is often preferred to running them as 64-bit because 64-bit applications may consume more memory. `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`設定是類似於`AnyCPU`不同之處在於它的預設動作是在支援 32 位元或 64 位元模式的系統上以 32 位元模式執行應用程式。The `AnyCPU32BitPreferred` setting is similar to `AnyCPU` except that its default action is to run applications in 32-bit mode on systems that support either 32-bit or 64-bit mode. 這項設定會配合未來可能沒有後援的 32 位元模式的處理器。This setting accommodates future processors that may not have a fallback 32-bit mode.
